value: Welcome! As a new member of the Saint Con Hospital Cybersecurity Department, your help is needed to ensure the patient information that we store and manage is kept private, safe, and secure. HIPAA requires us to conduct annual cybersecurity training and to test all employees on their knowledge on HIPAA Security. Are you up to the challenge? Are you ready to learn more?

Welcome to {ctf_name}!

{url}
